pkgmetadata.longdescription: Additional Matrix Functionality // Additional matrix functionality for R including: (1) wrappers for the base matrix function that allows matrices to be created from character strings and lists (the former is especially useful for creating block matrices), (ii) better printing of large matrices via a new generic function for "pretty" printing, and (iii) a number of convenience functions for users more familiar with other scientific languages like 'Julia', 'Matlab'/'Octave', or 'Python'+'NumPy'.
